column4: I have two servers running ubuntu.  This one has a monitor, keyboard, and mouse but the other one on my network has none of that.  I can login to its desktop via Cygwin on Windows, but I want to be able to do that same thing from this Linux box.  How do I get a remote gui login from here?
as root try this: X :1 vt8 -query (the machine ip)
and man X makes good reading too..
